Description.div:
The date in which the specified transfer schedule goes into effect. An empty value means that this transfer schedule will be effective for any date up until the EffectiveToDate. In order to change this date, the NodeTransferScheduleKey must be passed along with the new date.
The EffectiveFromDate overlaps an existing node transfer schedule.

The last date in which the specified transfer schedule will be in effect. An empty value means that this transfer schedule will be effective for any date in the future. In order to change this date, the NodeTransferScheduleKey must be passed along with the new date.
The EffectiveToDate overlaps an existing node transfer schedule.
The EffectiveToDate passed is before the EffectiveFromDate.

Attribute.Name: FridayTransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by FridayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Friday.

Description.div:
Value of FromNode can not be null.
If creating new record, FromNode is not passed OR If updating existing record, new value passed is null.

Attribute.Name: MondayTransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by MondayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Monday.

Description.div:
Operation to perform on this record.
Default: If not passed then API will try to either create or modify depending on the existence of the data.
Valid Values:
Create - Creates a new record.
Modify - Change values in an existing record.

Attribute.Name: SaturdayTransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by SaturdayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Saturday.

Attribute.Name: SundayTransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by SundayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Sunday.

Attribute.Name: ThursdayTransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by ThursdayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Thursday.

Description.div:
Value of ToNode can not be Null.
If creating new record, ToNode is not passed OR If updating existing record, new value passed is null.

Attribute.Name: TransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by DefaultTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
The default transit days between the 2 nodes. This will be used in transit time calculations if day-specific transit days is not defined.

Description.div:
This determines the UOM used for this transfer schedule. If null, then it is assumed to be DAY. Possible values: DAY, HR.
TransitUnitOfMeasure passed along with a deprecated attribute.

Attribute.Name: TuesdayTransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by TuesdayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Tuesday.

Attribute.Name: WednesdayTransitDays
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by WednesdayTransitTime and TransitUnitOfMeasure.
Number of Transit days for Wednesday.
